snippet: Staffan de Mistura, an Italian-Swedish diplomat, was chosen by the secretary general as the third envoy assigned to achieve peace, diplomats reported.
lead_paragraph: Staffan de Mistura, an Italian-Swedish diplomat, was chosen by the secretary general as the third envoy assigned to achieve peace, diplomats reported.

headline.main: Veteran Diplomat Said to Be Picked as Third Envoy in Syrian Conflict
headline.print_headline: Veteran Diplomat Said to Be Picked as Third Envoy in Syrian Conflict
